TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartDescription extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 控件的有关信息，该控件无需创建实例即可显示在 Web 部件控件目录中。

span.span: Provides information about a control that you can display in a catalog of Web Parts controls without having to create an instance of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件显示在用户可以添加到页面的控件的目录中，需要每个控件的一些基本信息。When controls are displayed in a catalog of controls that users can add to a page, some basic information about each control is required. 例如，它是很有用的标题控件，并输入说明，以便当用户查看目录具有足够的信息来决定是否将控件添加到页面。For example, it is useful to have a title for the control, and a description, so that as users view a catalog they have enough information to decide whether to add a control to the page. 但是，目录控件可能包含许多控件，并且如果的实例，它可能会影响应用程序的性能每个必须创建控件以提取要在目录中显示的信息。However, a catalog of controls can potentially contain many controls, and it could affect the performance of an application if an instance of every control must be created to extract the information to display in the catalog. ，以便不需要创建的实例存在的类控件来检索有关控件显示在控件目录中的信息。The class exists so that it is not necessary to create an instance of a control to retrieve the information about the control that is displayed in a catalog of controls. 在 Web 部件控件集，对象还与各种结合使用当页面已在目录中的控件显示模式。In the Web Parts control set, a object is also used in conjunction with the various controls when a page is in catalog display mode. 类具有其构造函数，另一个采用两个重载作为参数实例不可用的控件 (构造函数)，和一个接受多个字符串形式表示的控件有关的信息参数 (构造函数)。The class has two overloads of its constructor, one that takes a control as a parameter when an instance is available (the constructor), and one that takes several strings with information about the control as parameters (the constructor). 类还具有几个属性设计为包含的说明信息控件。The class also has several properties designed to contain the description information for controls. 下表总结了属性和每个哪些属性对应于在控件。The following table summarizes the properties, and what property each one corresponds to in a control. |Description 属性Description property|相关的部件控件属性Related part control property| |--------------------------|-----------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用类。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the class. 通常，此类主要由 Web 部件控件集，但此代码示例仅演示主要说明属性的基本编程的使用情况。Ordinarily, this type is used primarily by the Web Parts control set, but this code example is simply showing basic programmatic usage of the main description properties. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用户能够更改的用户控件在网页上显示模式。A user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. - 自定义控件。A custom control. - Web 页面以承载其他控件。A Web page to host the other controls. - 代码示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the code example works. 代码示例的第一部分是用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control. 用户控件的源代码来自另一个主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 有关用户控件的更多详细信息，请参阅主题[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more details about the user control, see the topic [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 代码示例的第二部分是一个自定义控件。The second part of the code example is a custom control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译的方法。This code example uses the approach of dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 代码示例的第三部分是 Web 页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是两个`Register`指令： 注册用户控件，另一个用于注册自定义的其中一个其源文件位于您的网站的 App_Code 文件夹中的控件。Near the top are two `Register` directives: one that registers the user control, and the other to register the custom control whose source file is located in the App_Code folder of your site. 该页面包含``元素，它又包含对两个控件的声明性引用： 自定义控件命名为`TextDisplayWebPart`，和一个Web 服务器控件，将被视为在运行控件时间，因为控件将其与包装对象。The page contains an `` element, which in turn contains declarative references to two controls: the custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, and a Web server control that will be treated as a control at run time because the control will wrap it with a object. 请注意，在的代码`Button1_Click`方法，可用对象的使用目录中的控件进行检索方法，然后说明详细信息被所有写出到页面。Note that in the code for the `Button1_Click` method, the available objects for the controls in the catalog are retrieved using the method, and then the description details are all written out to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**目录**页切换到目录显示模式。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to change the page to catalog display mode. 在目录中，您应看到两个可用于添加到页面的控件。In the catalog, you should see the two controls that are available to be added to the page. 单击**列表 web 部件说明信息**按钮，然后代码写出的所有可用值到页的对象。Click the **List WebPartDescription Information** button, and the code writes out the values of all available objects to the page. 此示例演示您可以检索说明详细信息而无需创建控件本身的实例的目录中的控件。This demonstrates that you can retrieve description details for controls in a catalog without having to create instances of the controls themselves.

summary.span: 初始化包含特定 控件有关信息的类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains information about a specific control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关重载构造函数都返回的新实例类，其中包含有关特定信息控件。The overloads for the constructor each return a new instance of the class, which contains information about a specific control. 重载之间的区别是在其中创建新的实例的方案。The difference between the overloads is the scenario in which the new instance is created. 在某些情况下，当应用程序具有的可用实例时控件，使用构造函数。In some cases, when the application has an available instance of a control, the constructor is used. 当应用程序没有控件实例时要通过导入控件说明文件都是如此控件，使用构造函数。When the application does not have a control instance, as is the case when a control description file is being imported through the control, the constructor is used.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart part) cil managed

param.name: part
param.span: 控件，其信息包含在 中。

summary.span: 如果 控件实例可用，则初始化类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class when a control instance is available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数用于创建一个新对象上的现有基于控件。The constructor is used for creating a new object based on an existing control. 此构造函数只需调用另一个重载构造函数中上, 获取所需的参数值从属性`part`参数。This constructor simply calls the other overload, the constructor, obtaining the required parameter values from properties on the `part` parameter.

exception.span: 的 属性为 或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The property of is or an empty string ("").

summary.span: 使用几个包含 控件说明信息的字符串初始化类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using several strings that contain description information for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数用于创建的新实例类时控件不可用。The constructor is used to create a new instance of the class when a control is not available. 例如，发生这种情况的情况下控制导入的描述文件控件。For example, this occurs in the case of an control when it imports a description file for a control. 获取创建所需的信息直接从说明文件中，对象和一个实例不存在。It gets the information it needs to create a object directly from the description file, and a instance is not present.

exception.span: 或 为 或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: or is or an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CatalogIconImageUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ CatalogIconImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个 URL，该 URL 包含用作 控件图标的图像的路径。

span.span: Gets a URL containing the path to an image used as an icon for a control.

value.span: 包含 URL 的字符串；默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: A string that contains a URL; the default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性直接对应于属性。The property corresponds directly to the property. 如果在设置该属性控件，则该属性在相应对象还具有一个值。If that property is set on a control, then the property in the corresponding object will also have a value. 页面时才在目录显示模式下，应用的属性和一个控件要显示在控件目录。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. 如果控件具有分配给它的属性值中的图标，图标显示在控件旁边的目录。If the control has an icon assigned to it in the property value, the icon appears in the catalog next to the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 运行此代码示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码中`Button1_Click`Web 页的方法演示如何获取的集合在目录中使用的对象方法，然后显示每个详细信息通过循环在目录中的控件通过对象。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 请注意，在下面的代码检索属性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Description As String
public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取 控件的说明文本。

span.span: Gets the text of a description for a control.

value.span: 包含 控件说明的字符串；默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: A string that contains the description for a control; the default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性直接对应于属性。The property corresponds directly to the property. 如果在设置该属性控件，则该属性在相应对象还具有一个值。If that property is set on a control, then the property in the corresponding object will also have a value. 页面时才在目录显示模式下，应用的属性和一个控件要显示在控件目录。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. 如果控件具有分配给它的说明，该描述显示在目录中为该控件上的工具提示。If the control has a description assigned to it, the description appears in the catalog as a ToolTip on the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 运行此代码示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码中`Button1_Click`Web 页的方法演示如何获取的集合在目录中使用的对象方法，然后显示每个详细信息通过循环在目录中的控件通过对象。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 请注意，在下面的代码检索属性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

public: property System::String ^ ID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取相应 控件的 ID。

span.span: Gets the ID of a corresponding control.

value.span: 包含控件 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性不能为`null`; 它必须始终具有值。The value of the property cannot be `null`; it must always have a value. 属性直接对应于属性。The property corresponds directly to the property. 页面时才在目录显示模式下，应用的属性和一个控件要显示在控件目录。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 运行此代码示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码中`Button1_Click`Web 页的方法演示如何获取的集合在目录中使用的对象方法，然后显示每个详细信息通过循环在目录中的控件通过对象。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 请注意，在下面的代码检索属性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Title As String
public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取相应 控件的标题文本。

span.span: Gets the title text of a corresponding control.

value.span: 字符串，包含相应控件的标题。

span.span: A string that contains the title of the corresponding control.

value.span: 默认值是一个计算出的字符串，由 .NET Framework 提供。

span.span: The default value is a calculated string supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性直接对应于属性。The value of the property corresponds directly to the property. 任何对应控件具有为其属性的值变得属性; 否则，标题是计算得出的值。Whatever the corresponding control has for its property, that becomes the value of the property; otherwise, the title is a calculated value. 页面时才在目录显示模式下，应用的属性和一个控件要显示在控件目录。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. 无论标题分配给目录中的控件旁边显示的控件。Whatever title is assigned to a control appears next to the control in the catalog. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 运行此代码示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码中`Button1_Click`Web 页的方法演示如何获取的集合在目录中使用的对象方法，然后显示每个详细信息通过循环在目录中的控件通过对象。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 请注意，在下面的代码检索属性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]
